forward_artillery_observer.name: Forward Observer (Artillery)
forward_artillery_observer.description: An artillery forward observer able to call in a fire mission.

veteran_riflemen.name: Veteran Infantry Section
veteran_riflemen.description: An experienced group of Australian veterans.

motor_riflemen.name: Motor Infantry Section
motor_riflemen.description: A group of motorized Australian infantry.

veteran_motor_riflemen.name: Veteran Motor Infantry Section
veteran_motor_riflemen.description: A group of veteran motorized Australian infantry.

airborne_section.name: Airborne Section
airborne_section.description: A group of trained Australian airborne.

veteran_airborne_section.name: Veteran Airborne Section
veteran_airborne_section.description: A group of veteran Australian Airborne.

commando_section.name: Commando Section
commando_section.description: The Australian Independent Commando Brigades played a pivotal role in almost every Australian campaign in the Pacific theater.sing on irregular and guerilla warfare, they brought the war deep behind enemy lines.

combat_engineers.name: Combat Engineers
combat_engineers.description: A squad of australian combat engineers.

flamethrower_team.name: Flamethrower Team
flamethrower_team.description: A team equipped to clear bunkers and other defensive positions.

sniper_team.name: Sniper Team
sniper_team.description: A team equipped to take out important targets from a distance.

sniper_team_veteran.name: Veteran Sniper Team
sniper_team_veteran.description: A team equipped to take out important targets from a distance.

at_rifle_team.name: AT Rifle Team
at_rifle_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting lighter tanks.

piat_team.name: Piat Team
piat_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting heavy tanks.

piat_team_veteran.name: Veteran Piat Team
piat_team_veteran.description: A team dedicated to hunting heavy tanks.

light_mortar_team.name: Light Mortar Team
light_mortar_team.description: A light mortar carried by a small team.

medium_mortar_team.name: Medium Mortar Team
medium_mortar_team.description: A medium mortar carried by a small team.

heavy_mortar_team.name: Heavy Mortar Team
heavy_mortar_team.description: A heavy mortar carried by a small team.

land_mattress.name: Land Mattress
land_mattress.description: A wheeled light rocket artillery piece.

17_pdr.name: 17-pdr AT Gun
17_pdr.description: A wheeled very heavy at gun.

aec_i.name: AEC MK I
aec_i.description: A well-armed and fast armored car.

aec_ii_iii.name: AEC MK II/III
aec_ii_iii.description: A well-armed and fast armored car.

cromwell.name: Cromwell
cromwell.description: A fast medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

centaur_cs.name: Centaur CS
centaur_cs.description: A fast medium tank with an infantry-support howitzer.

sherman_v.name: Sherman V
sherman_v.description: A medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

sherman_firefly.name: Sherman Firefly
sherman_firefly.description: A medium tank with a very heavy tank-killing gun.

sherman_v_command.name: Sherman V (Command)
sherman_v_command.description: A medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

churchill_avre.name: Churchill AVRE
churchill_avre.description: A heavy tank that is well-armored with an adequate main gun.

churchill_crocodile.name: Churchill Crocodile
churchill_crocodile.description: A heavy tank that is well-armored with an adequate main gun.

churchill_iii.name: Churchill III, IV, IV
churchill_iii.description: A heavy tank that is well-armored with an adequate main gun.

churchill_vii.name: Churchill VII
churchill_vii.description: A heavy tank that is well-armored with an adequate main gun.

churchill_viii.name: Churchill VIII
churchill_viii.description: A heavy tank that is well-armored with an adequate main gun.

rapid_fire.name: Rapid Fire
rapid_fire.flavor: Australian infantry were trained to fire their rifles at an incredibly high rate.
rapid_fire.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit with Rifles is firing. Hits rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional shot.

ANZAC Spirit.name: ANZAC Spirit
ANZAC Spirit.flavor: The Australian-New Zealand Army Corps was a combined force that fought during WWI. While the ANZAC only fought briefly as a combined unit again in WWII, the Australian military continued to demonstrate the same spirit of determination and steadfastness under fire.
ANZAC Spirit.description: Use when a Australian _Infantry_ unit is activated. That unit immediately removes D3 shock.

focus_fire.name: Focus Fire
focus_fire.flavor: With deadly accuracy, bren guns can be used to pin down key units.
focus_fire.description: Use when a Australian _Infantry_ unit that contains a Bren Gun (Mag-LMG) fires. If the attack hits, it assigns 2 additional shock to all affected targets.

natural_leader.name: Natural Leader
natural_leader.description: This unit and friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" get +1 Courage and +1 Initiative.

defensive_fire.name: Defensive Fire
defensive_fire.description: This unit and friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" get +1 Accuracy when using an Ambush reaction.

move_it.name: Move It
move_it.description: When this unit is activated, this unit and friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" may immediately remove one shock.

mobile_expert.name: Mobile Expert
mobile_expert.description: This unit may move and fire assault weapons without suffering the -1 to hit penalty.

ambush_tactics.name: Ambush Tactics
ambush_tactics.description: This unit and one other friendly _Infantry_ unit may be placed in hidden deployment instead of deployed on the field. See the section for hidden units in the core rules for details on how hidden units work.

tom_derrick.name: Tom Derrick
tom_derrick.flavor: Tom Derrick recieved the Victoria Cross for singlehandidly eliminating seven enemy machine gun posts, and helping his platoon destroy a further three, in New Guinea in 1943.
tom_derrick.description: Upgrade one squad NCO model with Mobile Expert.

simon_fraser.name: Simon Fraser
simon_fraser.flavor: Fraser lead the 1st SAS brigade and helped relieve troops during the D-Day offensive. He was known to be a particularly inspiring commander.
simon_fraser.description: Upgrade one Field Officer model with Natural Leader.
